title: Sell Thompson Bros Whisky
metaTitle: Sell Thompson Bros / Dornoch Whisky | Artistic Labels | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Thompson Bros (Dornoch) whisky. We buy the artistic label releases, Dornoch Distillery inaugural releases, and single casks.
heroSubhead: Direct buyer for Thompson Bros / Dornoch Distillery releases.
introParagraph: Phil and Simon Thompson (Thompson Bros) operate out of the Dornoch Castle Hotel. Their indie bottlings are famous for whimsical, artistic labels and exceptional cask selection.
conditionFactors: Label Art: The labels are key. Check for scuffs.
Wax Seals: Many releases use wax dips. Check for cracks.
Batch: Early batches of blends like SRV5 are more desirable.
pricingFactors: Distillery: Secret Islay/Speyside releases are popular.
Inaugural: The first release from their own Dornoch Distillery is a major collector item.
Label Artist: Specific labels (e.g. KT) have fans.
Rum: Their heavy Jamaican rum bottlings are cult hits.

faqs.question: Do you buy Dornoch Distillery whisky?
faqs.answer: Yes, we are very keen on the Inaugural Release and Cask 1 bottles (if they exist in the wild).

faqs.question: Do you buy the blends?
faqs.answer: Yes, TB/BSW and SRV5 blends are bought in volume or early batches.

faqs.question: What about the 1980s vintages?
faqs.answer: They bottle some incredible old stock. We buy it all.

faqs.question: Do you buy the Cognac?
faqs.answer: Yes, Thompson Bros Cognac selections are top tier.

faqs.question: How do I ship?
faqs.answer: Standard secure packing. Wax seals need extra padding.

faqs.question: Is TG Thompson the same?
faqs.answer: Yes, TG Thompson is the company name.
